mapper.select: SELECT o.`identity_id` FROM `dc_org` o join `mo_org_expand` oe on o.`identity_id` = oe.`identity_id` WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND oe.identity_ip is not null AND (oe.`is_public` = 1 OR o.`identity_id` IN ( SELECT `identity_id` FROM `mo_org_user` WHERE `address` = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

SELECT o.`node_name`, o.`identity_id`, o.`status`, o.update_at, o.wallet_address as observerProxyWalletAddress, oe.`identity_ip`, oe.`identity_port`, oe.`is_public` as public_flag, oe.is_authority, oe.is_certified FROM `dc_org` o join `mo_org_expand` oe on o.`identity_id` = oe.`identity_id` WHERE `status` = 1 AND oe.identity_ip is not null AND (oe.`is_public` = 1 OR o.`identity_id` IN ( SELECT `identity_id` FROM `mo_org_user` WHERE `address` = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
